DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact clinician education , electronic health record integrate patient report outcomes , electronic health record integrate decision support pain-related care quality , outcomes , service utilization .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Patient Reported Outcomes ( I-PRO ) Study Multidisciplinary Pain Care
DOC.detailed_description: The initiative three component aid clinician ' care patient chronic noncancer pain : ( 1 ) education , ( 2 ) standardize patient report outcomes data collection , ( 3 ) evidence-based brief treatment reminder . Practices randomize either receive three novel component ( treatment group ) continue usual care ( control group ) . Providers treatment group ask ( ) complete series six online education module pain care , ( b ) give access new patient report outcomes questionnaire data collect patient within electronic health record , ( c ) ask review data relate care recommendation patient visit , ( ) ask complete baseline monthly online survey related experience satisfaction provide care patient chronic noncancer pain . Providers control group provide care usual patient ask complete baseline monthly online survey related experience satisfaction provide care patient chronic noncancer pain . Primary study outcome include comparison treatment control group provider patient satisfaction survey . Secondary outcome measure include provider referral rate , patient outcome , patient treatment recommended/ordered , patient service utilization/costs .
DOC.criteria: Providers one six active Community Health Family Medicine location University Florida Health system Gainesville service area ( Hampton Oaks , Eastside , Jonesville , Haile ) May 1 , 2014 September 1 , 2015 Doctor Medicine ( MD ) , Doctor Osteopathic Medicine ( DO ) , Advanced Registered Nurse Practitioner ( ARNP ) , Physician Assistant ( PA ) faculty professional providing primary care service Residents trainees one four active Community Health Family Medicine location University Florida Health system Gainesville service area ( Hampton Oaks , Eastside , Jonesville , Haile ) May 1 , 2014 September 1 , 2015
